Avarkalai ataikinra vetanai niccayamaka avalaiyum ataiyum. (Vetanai vara) niccayamaka ivarkalukku vakkalikkappatta neram vitiyarkalaiyakum. Vitiyarkalai camipamaka illaiya?'' Enru kurinarkal
